DOC.brief_summary: This study aim identify various time-variant time-invariant component EEG signal use advanced signal processing technique , machine learning . The investigator ' ultimate goal develop universal customise brain-computer interface stable across day even year .
DOC.brief_title: Identification Time-invariant EEG Signals Brain-Computer Interface
DOC.criteria: Exclusion criterion : 1 . Severe vision disorder prevent volunteer recognize instruction screen 2 . Severe psychiatric disorder 3 . Severe sleep disorder keep volunteer awake two hour 4 . Volunteers claustrophobia 5 . Patients underwent stroke brain surgery 6 . Patients neuromuscular disease
DOC.keyword: electroencephalogram ( EEG ) , Human brain , Brain-Computer Interface
